QA.question: What is your return policy?
QA.answer: You can return items within 30 days of purchase.
paraphrases: Can I return an item?
How can I initiate a return?
What are the rules for returning items?
How do I return my order?

QA.question: How do I track my order?
QA.answer: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email.
paraphrases: Can I check my order status?
Where is my order?
How can I track where my order is?
Is there a way to find my shipment?

QA.question: What payment methods do you accept?
QA.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and UPI.
paraphrases: How can I pay for my order?
Do you support PayPal?
What payment options are available?
Can I pay with my card?

QA.question: Do you ship internationally?
QA.answer: Yes, we ship to select countries. Check our shipping policy for details.
paraphrases: Can I place an order from abroad?
Do you deliver to other countries?
Is international shipping available?
Can I order if I’m not in the country?

QA.question: How can I cancel my order?
QA.answer: You can cancel your order from the 'My Orders' section before it is shipped.
paraphrases: Can I stop my order?
How do I cancel an ongoing order?
Is it possible to cancel my purchase?
How do I remove an order?
cancle my order

QA.question: How long does shipping take?
QA.answer: Shipping usually takes 5-7 business days.
paraphrases: When will I receive my order?
What is the delivery time?
How many days for shipping?
How quickly do you deliver?

QA.question: What is your refund process?
QA.answer: Refunds are processed within 7 business days after the returned item is received.
paraphrases: How do I get my money back?
What are the steps for a refund?
When will I get my refund?
Can you refund me?

QA.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
QA.answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for an additional charge during checkout.
paraphrases: Can you wrap my order as a gift?
Is there a gift packaging option?
How can I add gift wrapping?
Do you wrap items for gifts?

QA.question: Can I change my delivery address?
QA.answer: You can update your delivery address before the order is shipped.
paraphrases: How do I edit my address?
Can I correct the shipping address?
What if my address is wrong?
Can I update where my package goes?

QA.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
QA.answer: Please contact customer support with photos of the damaged item for assistance.
paraphrases: How do I report a broken item?
What if my package is damaged?
Can I return a defective product?
What happens if I receive something broken?

QA.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
QA.answer: Yes, you can earn points for every purchase and redeem them for discounts.
paraphrases: Can I earn rewards?
Is there a points system?
Do you have customer rewards?
How do loyalty points work?

QA.question: Do you offer discounts for first-time buyers?
QA.answer: Yes, new customers get a 10% discount on their first purchase.
paraphrases: Is there a promo for new users?
Do first-time customers get a discount?
What offers do you have for new buyers?
Are there discounts for first orders?

QA.question: Can I pay using cryptocurrency?
QA.answer: No, we currently do not accept cryptocurrency payments.
paraphrases: Do you take Bitcoin?
Can I pay with crypto?
Is Ethereum accepted?

QA.question: Can I purchase without creating an account?
QA.answer: Yes, you can check out as a guest without signing up.
paraphrases: Do I need an account to buy?
Can I order as a guest?

QA.question: Do you offer installment payment options?
QA.answer: Yes, we offer installment payments via Klarna and Afterpay.
paraphrases: Can I pay in parts?
Is EMI available?

QA.question: I don’t like the product?
QA.answer: You can return the product within the return period for a refund or exchange.
paraphrases: Can I return something I don’t want?

QA.question: contact customer support?
QA.answer: You can reach our support team via email or live chat on our website.

QA.question: What happens if my payment fails?
QA.answer: If your payment fails, please try again or contact your bank for assistance.

QA.question: Do you offer free shipping?
QA.answer: We offer free shipping on orders above $50.

QA.question: Do you have a mobile app?
QA.answer: Yes, you can download our app from the App Store or Google Play.
